mission.pre: WE ARE YOUNG PEOPLE PEDALING FOR:
mission.mid: CONNECTING PEOPLE, SHARING KNOWLEDGE & SPARKING CHANGE

ride.title: RIDE WITH PURPOSE
ride.desc: On our rides you exercise, make friends, and rediscover the city. Each outing has a theme—we learn and contribute to a safer city.

learn.title: LEARN & SHARE
learn.desc: Through road-safety, basic mechanics and beginner cycling workshops, we build a safe, responsible cycling culture by sharing knowledge and experience.

change.title: WE SPARK CHANGE
change.desc: Through community and our events, we organize to promote sustainable mobility and help shape a safer, healthier and more sustainable city for everyone.

learn.name: María Piedad
learn.text: Before coming to the workshop, I was really scared—panicked around cars and wasn’t confident in my balance. Now it’s the complete opposite. I loved the workshop; cycling along the riverbank and connecting with nature was an incredible experience. I got my confidence back.

ride.name: Daniela
ride.text: The workshops gave me the confidence to cycle safely on my own.

change.name: Adrián
change.text: Joining the campaigns helped me see the social power of the bicycle.

adrian.name: Adrián Bermeo Tosi, 23
adrian.bio: Clinical Psychology student and  S2Cities 2024 volunteer. Passionate about youth spaces and healthy, sustainable communities.

julio.name: Julio Díaz Torres, 27
julio.bio: Lawyer & software developer from Ecuador. Tomebambike founder and S2Cities 2024 volunteer; loves the right-to-the-city debate and data-driven impact.

daniela.name: Daniela Sigua Rey, 22
daniela.bio: International Studies student focused on social & environmental impact, actively creating positive change in communities.
